newsitem.title: THAILAND: BOXING-CHATCHAI RETAINS WBC FLYWEIGHT TITLE.
newsitem.headline: BOXING-CHATCHAI RETAINS WBC FLYWEIGHT TITLE.

text.p: Chatchai Sasakul of Thailand retained his World Boxing Council flyweight crown on Friday when Argentine challenger Juan Domingo Cordoba retired from the contest after the seventh round.
Chatchai won the vacant title in May after Russia's Yuri Arbachakov was stripped of the title.
